exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros d sigma m H. unfold predta_correct_wrt_sign, preDTA_kill in *. intros a s H'. destruct d; simpl in *. - inversion H. rewrite H2 in *. inversion H'. - destruct (states_kill m s) eqn:E. + inversion H. subst. apply kill_empty_correct_wrt_sign_invar_1 in H'. rewrite E in H'. inversion H'. + inversion H. subst. now rewrite E in *.
